suite.name: Kabum Testes

kw.name: Abrir o navegador
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Log Level
kw.msg: Log level changed from INFO to TRACE.
kw.doc: Sets the log threshold to the specified level.
Abre o site Kabum.

test.name: Buscar E Adicionar Produto No Carrinho

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Given O usuário acessa o site Kabum
Title Should Be
kw.msg: Arguments: [ 'KaBuM! | Aperte o K e evolua com as maiores ofertas em Tech e Gamer!' ]

Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":"KaBuM! | Aperte o K e evolua com as maiores ofertas em Tech e Gamer!"} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '80', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
Page title is 'KaBuM! | Aperte o K e evolua com as maiores ofertas em Tech e Gamer!'.
kw.arg: KaBuM! | Aperte o K e evolua com as maiores ofertas em Tech e Gamer!
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
Verifica que a página principal foi carregada.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.msg: Arguments: [ 'Acesso realizado ao site da Kabum' ]
kw.arg: Acesso realizado ao site da Kabum
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: When O usuário busca por "notebook"
Input Text
kw.msg: Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.msg: Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
Pressing special key RETURN to element.
Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Realiza a busca pelo termo "notebook".

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: And O usuário seleciona o primeiro produto da lista
Click Button

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: And O usuário fecha a tela de opções de frete
Press Keys
kw.msg: Pressing special key ESCAPE to browser.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: And O usuário clica em "Comprar"
Click Element
kw.msg: Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Clica no botão de comprar.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: And O usuário seleciona a garantia de +12 meses
Click Element
kw.msg: Arguments: [ "xpath=//span[@class='text-xs font-semibold text-black-800'][contains(.,'12 Meses de garantia')]" ]
Clicking element 'xpath=//span[@class='text-xs font-semibold text-black-800'][contains(.,'12 Meses de garantia')]'.
POST http://localhost:59916/session/d7f0e3fafb076975fd9b9a7d6d7bf334/elements {'using': 'xpath', 'value': "//span[@class='text-xs font-semibold text-black-800'][contains(.,'12 Meses de garantia')]"}
Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
kw.arg: xpath=//span[@class='text-xs font-semibold text-black-800'][contains(.,'12 Meses de garantia')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Seleciona a opção de garantia estendida de +12 meses.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: And O usuário clica em "Ir para o carrinho"
Click Element
kw.msg: Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
Clica no botão de "Ir para o carrinho".

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Then O produto é adicionado corretamente ao carrinho
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
Current page contains text 'Carrinho de Compras - KaBuM!'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.
Valida que o produto foi adicionado ao carrinho.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.doc: Este caso de teste realiza a busca de um "notebook", valida o frete, e adiciona o produto ao carrinho com garantia estendida.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.msg: Closing browser with session id d7f0e3fafb076975fd9b9a7d6d7bf334.
Remote response: status=200 | data={"value":null} | headers=HTTPHeaderDict({'Content-Length': '14', 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'cache-control': 'no-cache'})
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc: Essa suíte testa o site da Kabum.com.br
